# autoupdate

Toggle auto-update policy for a workspace

## Usage

```console
coder autoupdate [flags] <workspace> <always|never>
```

## Options

### -y, --yes

|      |                   |
|------|-------------------|
| Type | <code>bool</code> |

Run in non-interactive mode. Accepts default values and fails on required inputs.
